head_line: Lightning Ridge Journal: An Amateur Undertaking in Australian Mining Town With No Funeral Home

array.sentence: A Tunisian court has jailed a Nigerian student for two years for helping young militants join an armed Islamic group in Lebanon, his lawyer said Wednesday.
